card_text: For today's exercises you will need a chair and a wall.
Find a sturdy chair.
Stand on your right foot.
Now stand on your left foot.
Face a wall.
Do a few wall push-ups.
Stand on tiptoes.
Sit in a chair.
Slowly bend forward and slowly sit back up.
Find an armless chair.
Raise arms and move them back.
Bend your ankles again.
Stand behind your chair. Stretch your left leg.
Stretch your right leg.
Stretch your left leg and then your right leg.
Today you will need some hand weights. Water bottles or soup cans will do. You may also need to use a wall for balance.
Stand near a wall for balance. Place one foot right in front of the other.
Walk heel to toe.
Find some hand weights. Water bottles or soup cans will do.
Lower and lift your arms.
Do a few arm curls.
Find a chair. Bend your left knee.
Now bend your right knee.
Slowly turn your head to the right and left.
Face a wall. Walk your hands up the wall.
This exercise stretches the muscles of your lower back. If you've had hip or back surgery
column9: talk with your doctor before trying this stretch.

card_text: Lie on your back. Bend your knees and lower both legs to one side and then the other.
This exercise stretches the muscles in the back of your legs. If you've had hip or back surgery
column9: talk with your doctor before trying this stretch.

card_text: Lie on your back. Raise one leg and pull toward you. Then switch legs.
